question.text: On a motorway you may only stop on the hard shoulder

explanation.text: You should only stop on the hard shoulder in a genuine emergency. DON’T stop on it to have a rest or picnic, pick up hitchhikers, answer a mobile phone or check a map. If you miss your intended exit carry on to the next, never reverse along the hard shoulder.

answer.text: if you feel tired and need to rest
if you miss the exit that you wanted
